tgt_original: 或說修多羅、　　伽陀及本事、 本生未曾有，　　亦說於因緣、 譬喻并祇夜、　　優波提舍經。

src_original: ye bhonti hīnābhiratā avidvasū acīrṇacaryā bahubuddhakoṭiṣu /
tgt_original: 鈍根樂小法，　　貪著於生死， 於諸無量佛，　　不行深妙道，

src_original: saṃsāralagnāśca suduḥkhitāśca nirvāṇa teṣāmupadarśayāmi // Saddhp_2.46 //
tgt_original: 眾苦所惱亂，　　為是說涅槃。

src_original: upāyametaṃ kurute svayaṃbhūrbauddhasya jñānasya prabodhanārtham /
tgt_original: 我設是方便，　　令得入佛慧，

src_original: na cāpi teṣāṃ pravade kadācid yuṣme 'pi buddhā iha loki bheṣyatha // Saddhp_2.47 //
tgt_original: 未曾說汝等，　　當得成佛道。

src_original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kālamavekṣya tāyī kṣaṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tatu paśca bhāṣate /
tgt_original: 所以未曾說，　　說時未至故，

src_original: so 'yaṃ kṣaṇo adya kathaṃci labdho vadāmi yeneha ca bhūtaniścayam // Saddhp_2.48 //
tgt_original: 今正是其時，　　決定說大乘。

src_original: navāṅgametanmama śāsanaṃ ca prakāśitaṃ sattvabalābalena /  upāya eṣo varadasya jñāne praveśanārthāya nidarśito me // Saddhp_2.49 //
tgt_original: 我此九部法，　　隨順眾生說， 入大乘為本，　　以故說是經。

src_original: tathā hi te āśayasaṃpadāya viśuddharūpāya samanvitābhūn /  vadāmi tān buddha bhaviṣyatheti anāgate 'dhvāni hitānukampakāḥ // Saddhp_2.51 //
tgt_original: 我記如是人，　　來世成佛道， 以深心念佛，　　修持淨戒故。

src_original: śrutvā ca prītisphuṭa bhonti sarve buddhā bhaviṣyāma jagatpradhānāḥ /
tgt_original: 此等聞得佛，　　大喜充遍身，

src_original: punaśca haṃ jāniya teṣa caryāṃ vaipulyasūtrāṇi prakāśayāmi // Saddhp_2.52 //
tgt_original: 佛知彼心行，　　故為說大乘。

src_original: sudharmeṇa ca kinnararājena,  dharmadhareṇa ca kinnararājena /  caturbhiśca gandharvakāyikadevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ bahugandharvaśatasahasraparivāraiḥ /  tadyathā - manojñena ca gandharveṇa manojñasvareṇa ca madhureṇa ca madhurasvareṇa ca gandharveṇa /
tgt_original: 有四乾闥婆王——樂乾闥婆王、樂音乾闥婆王、美乾闥婆王、美音乾闥婆王，各與若干百千眷屬俱。

src_original: ime ca te śrāvaka nāyakasya yehi śrutaṃ śāsanametamagryam /
tgt_original: 聲聞若菩薩，　　聞我所說法，

src_original: ekāpi gāthā śruta dhāritā vā sarveṣa bodhāya na saṃśayo 'sti // Saddhp_2.53 //
tgt_original: 乃至於一偈，　　皆成佛無疑。

src_original: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate tṛtiyaṃ hi naivāsti kadāci loke /
tgt_original: 十方佛土中，　　唯有一乘法， 無二亦無三。

src_original: anyatrupāyā puruṣottamānāṃ yadyānanānātvupadarśayanti // Saddhp_2.54 //
tgt_original: 除佛方便說。 但以假名字，　　引導於眾生，

src_original: bauddhasya jñānasya prakāśanārthaṃ loke samutpadyati lokanāthaḥ /
tgt_original: 說佛智慧故，　　諸佛出於世。

src_original: ekaṃ hi kāryaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate na hīnayānena nayanti buddhāḥ // Saddhp_2.55 //
tgt_original: 唯此一事實，　　餘二則非真， 終不以小乘，　　濟度於眾生。

src_original: pratiṣṭhito yatra svayaṃ svayaṃbhūryaccaiva buddhaṃ yatha yādṛśaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 佛自住大乘，　　如其所得法，

src_original: balāśca ye dhyānavimokṣa-indriyāstatraiva sattvā pi pratiṣṭhapeti // Saddhp_2.56 //
tgt_original: 定慧力莊嚴，　　以此度眾生。

src_original: yadi hīnayānasmi pratiṣṭhapeyamekaṃ pi sattvaṃ na mamate sādhu // Saddhp_2.57 //
tgt_original: 若以小乘化，　　乃至於一人，

src_original: mātsarya mahyaṃ na kahiṃci vidyate īrṣyā na me nāpi ca chandarāgaḥ /
tgt_original: 我則墮慳貪，　　此事為不可。

src_original: yathā hyahaṃ citritu lakṣaṇehi prabhāsayanto imu sarvalokam /
tgt_original: 我以相嚴身，　　光明照世間，

src_original: puraskṛtaḥ prāṇiśatairanekairdeśemimāṃ dharmasvabhāvamudrām // Saddhp_2.59 //
tgt_original: 無量眾所尊，　　為說實相印。

src_original: evaṃ ca cintemyahu śāriputra kathaṃ nu evaṃ bhavi sarvasattvāḥ /  dvātriṃśatīlakṣaṇarūpadhāriṇaḥ svayaṃprabhā lokavidū svayaṃbhūḥ // Saddhp_2.60 //
tgt_original: 舍利弗當知，　　我本立誓願， 欲令一切眾，　　如我等無異。

src_original: paripūrṇametat praṇidhānu mahyaṃ buddhā ca bodhiṃ ca prakāśayāmi // Saddhp_2.61 //  sacedahaṃ śārisutā vadeyaṃ sattvāna bodhāya janetha chandam /
tgt_original: 化一切眾生，　　皆令入佛道。 若我遇眾生，　　盡教以佛道，

src_original: ajānakāḥ sarva bhrameyuratra na jātu gṛhṇīyu subhāṣitaṃ me // Saddhp_2.62 //
tgt_original: 無智者錯亂，　　迷惑不受教。

src_original: tāṃścaiva haṃ jāniya evarūpān na cīrṇacaryāḥ purimāsu jātiṣu /
tgt_original: 我知此眾生，　　未曾修善本，

src_original: adhyoṣitāḥ kāmaguṇeṣu saktāstṛṣṇāya saṃmūrchita mohacittāḥ // Saddhp_2.63 //  te kāmahetoḥ prapatanti durgatiṃ ṣaṭsū gatīṣū parikhidyamānāḥ /
tgt_original: 堅著於五欲，　　癡愛故生惱。 以諸欲因緣，　　墜墮三惡道， 輪迴六趣中，　　備受諸苦毒，

src_original: kaṭasī ca vardhenti punaḥ punaste duḥkhena saṃpīḍita alpapuṇyāḥ // Saddhp_2.64 //
tgt_original: 受胎之微形，　　世世常增長。 薄德少福人，　　眾苦所逼迫，

src_original: vilagna dṛṣṭīgahaneṣu nityamastīti nāstīti tathāsti nāsti /
tgt_original: 入邪見稠林，　　若有若無等。

src_original: dvāṣaṣṭi dṛṣṭīkṛta niśrayitvā asanta bhāvaṃ parigṛhya te sthitāḥ // Saddhp_2.65 //
tgt_original: 依止此諸見，　　具足六十二， 深著虛妄法，　　堅受不可捨，

src_original: (Vaidya 33)  duḥśodhakā mānina dambhinaśca vaṅkāḥ śaṭhā alpaśrutāśca bālāḥ /
tgt_original: 我慢自矜高，　　諂曲心不實，

src_original: te naiva śṛṇvanti subuddhaghoṣaṃ kadāci pi jātisahasrakoṭiṣu // Saddhp_2.66 //
tgt_original: 於千萬億劫，　　不聞佛名字，

src_original: teṣāmahaṃ śārisutā upāyaṃ vadāmi duḥkhasya karotha antam /  duḥkhena saṃpīḍita dṛṣṭva sattvān nirvāṇa tatrāpyupadarśayāmi // Saddhp_2.67 //
tgt_original: 亦不聞正法，　　如是人難度。 是故舍利弗！ 　　我為設方便，說諸盡苦道，　　示之以涅槃。 我雖說涅槃，　　是亦非真滅，

src_original: evaṃ ca bhāṣāmyahu nityanirvṛtā ādipraśāntā imi sarvadharmāḥ /
tgt_original: 諸法從本來，　　常自寂滅相。

src_original: caryāṃ ca so pūriya buddhaputro anāgate 'dhvāni jino bhaviṣyati // Saddhp_2.68 //
tgt_original: 佛子行道已，　　來世得作佛，

src_original: upāyakauśalya mamaivarūpaṃ yat trīṇi yānānyupadarśayāmi /
tgt_original: 我有方便力，　　開示三乘法。

src_original: ekaṃ tu yānaṃ hi nayaśca eka ekā ciyaṃ deśana nāyakānām // Saddhp_2.69 //
tgt_original: 一切諸世尊，　　皆說一乘道，

src_original: vyapanehi kāṅkṣāṃ tatha saṃśayaṃ ca yeṣāṃ ca keṣāṃ ciha kāṅkṣa vidyate /
tgt_original: 今此諸大眾，　　皆應除疑惑，

src_original: ananyathāvādina lokanāyakā ekaṃ idaṃ yānu dvitīyu nāsti // Saddhp_2.70 //
tgt_original: 諸佛語無異，　　唯一無二乘。

src_original: ye cāpyabhūvan purimāstathāgatāḥ parinirvṛtā buddhasahasra neke /  atītamadhvānamasaṃkhyakalpe teṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ na kadāci vidyate // Saddhp_2.71 //
tgt_original: 過去無數劫，　　無量滅度佛， 百千萬億種，　　其數不可量。

src_original: caturbhiścāsurendraiḥ sārdhaṃ bahvasurakoṭīśatasahasraparivāraiḥ /  tadyathā - balinā ca asurendreṇa,  kharaskandhena ca asurendreṇa,  vemacitriṇā ca asurendreṇa,  rāhuṇā ca asurendreṇa /
tgt_original: 有四阿修羅王——婆稚阿修羅王、佉羅騫馱阿修羅王、毘摩質多羅阿修羅王、羅睺阿修羅王，各與若干百千眷屬俱。 有四迦樓羅王——大威德迦樓羅王、大身迦樓羅王、大滿迦樓羅王、如意迦樓羅王，各與若干百千眷屬俱。

src_original: dṛṣṭāntakaiḥ kāraṇahetubhiśca upāyakauśalyaśatairanekaiḥ // Saddhp_2.72 //
tgt_original: 無數方便力，　　演說諸法相。

src_original: sarve ca te darśayi ekayānamekaṃ ca yānaṃ avatārayanti /
tgt_original: 是諸世尊等，　　皆說一乘法， 化無量眾生，　　令入於佛道。

src_original: anye upāyā vividhā jinānāṃ yehī prakāśentimamagradharmam /  jñātvādhimuktiṃ tatha āśayaṃ ca tathāgatā loki sadevakasmin // Saddhp_2.74 //
tgt_original: 又諸大聖主，　　知一切世間， 天人群生類，　　深心之所欲， 更以異方便，　　助顯第一義。

src_original: ye cāpi sattvāstahi teṣa saṃmukhaṃ śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ atha vā śrutāvinaḥ /
tgt_original: 若有眾生類，　　值諸過去佛，

src_original: dānaṃ ca dattaṃ caritaṃ ca śīlaṃ kṣāntyā ca saṃpādita sarvacaryāḥ // Saddhp_2.75 //
tgt_original: 若聞法布施，　　或持戒忍辱、

src_original: vīryeṇa dhyānena kṛtādhikārāḥ prajñāya vā cintita eti dharmāḥ /  vividhāni puṇyāni kṛtāni yehi te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.76 //
tgt_original: 精進禪智等，　　種種修福慧。 如是諸人等，　　皆已成佛道。

src_original: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca jināna teṣāṃ ye śāsane kecidabhūṣi sattvāḥ /
tgt_original: 諸佛滅度已，　　若人善軟心，

src_original: ye cāpi dhātūna karonti pūjāṃ jināna teṣāṃ parinirvṛtānām /
tgt_original: 諸佛滅度已，　　供養舍利者，

src_original: ratnāmayān stūpasahasra nekān suvarṇarūpyasya ca sphāṭikasya // Saddhp_2.78 //
tgt_original: 起萬億種塔，　　金銀及頗梨、

src_original: ye cāśmagarbhasya karonti stūpān karketanāmuktamayāṃśca kecit /  vaiḍūryaśreṣṭhasya tathendranīlān te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.79 //
tgt_original: 車𤦲與馬腦、　　玫瑰琉璃珠， 清淨廣嚴飾，　　莊校於諸塔。

src_original: ye cāpi śaileṣu karonti stūpān ye candanānāmagurusya kecit /
tgt_original: 或有起石廟，　　栴檀及沈水，

src_original: uddiśya ye pāṃsukarāśayo 'pi aṭavīṣu durgeṣu ca kārayanti // Saddhp_2.81 //  uddiśya kārāpita yehi cāpi te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.83 //
tgt_original: 若於曠野中，　　積土成佛廟， 乃至童子戲，　　聚沙為佛塔， 如是諸人等，　　皆已成佛道。

src_original: ye saptaratnāmaya tatra kecid ye tāmrikā vā tatha kāṃsikā vā /  kārāpayīṣu sugatāna bimbā te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.84 //
tgt_original: 若人為佛故，　　建立諸形像， 刻雕成眾相，　　皆已成佛道。 或以七寶成，　　鍮石赤白銅、

src_original: sīsasya lohasya ca mṛttikāya vā kārāpayīṣu sugatāna vigrahān /
tgt_original: 白鑞及鉛錫，　　鐵木及與泥， 或以膠漆布，　　嚴飾作佛像，

src_original: ye pustakarmāmaya darśanīyāṃste sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.85 //
tgt_original: 如是諸人等，　　皆已成佛道。

src_original: ye citrabhittīṣu karonti vigrahān paripūrṇagātrān śatapuṇyalakṣaṇān /
tgt_original: 彩畫作佛像，　　百福莊嚴相，

src_original: likhetsvayaṃ cāpi likhāpayedvā te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.86 //
tgt_original: 自作若使人，　　皆已成佛道。

src_original: ye cāpi kecittahi śikṣamāṇāḥ krīḍāratiṃ cāpi vinodayantaḥ /  nakhena kāṣṭhena kṛtāsi vigrahān bhittīṣu puruṣā ca kumārakā vā // Saddhp_2.87 //
tgt_original: 乃至童子戲，　　若草木及筆， 或以指爪甲，　　而畫作佛像， 如是諸人等，　　漸漸積功德，

src_original: sarve ca te kārūṇikā abhūvan sarve 'pi te tārayi prāṇikoṭyaḥ /  samādapentā bahubodhisatvāṃste sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.88 //
tgt_original: 具足大悲心，　　皆已成佛道。 但化諸菩薩，　　度脫無量眾。

src_original: dhātūṣu yaiścāpi tathāgatānāṃ stūpeṣu vā mṛttikavigraheṣu vā /  ālekhyabhittīṣvapi pāṃsustūpe puṣpā ca gandhā ca pradatta āsīt // Saddhp_2.89 //
tgt_original: 若人於塔廟、　　寶像及畫像， 以華香幡蓋，　　敬心而供養。

src_original: vādyā ca vādāpita yehi tatra bheryo 'tha śaṅkhāḥ paṭahāḥ sughoṣakāḥ /
tgt_original: 若使人作樂，　　擊鼓吹角貝，

src_original: nirnāditā dundubhayaśca yehi pūjāvidhānāya varāgrabodhinām // Saddhp_2.90 //  vīṇāśca tālā paṇavāśca yehi mṛdaṅga vaṃśā tuṇavā manojñāḥ /
tgt_original: 簫笛琴箜篌、　　琵琶鐃銅鈸， 如是眾妙音，　　盡持以供養。 或以歡喜心，　　歌唄頌佛德，

src_original: ekotsavā vā sukumārakā vā te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.91 //
tgt_original: 乃至一小音，　　皆已成佛道。

src_original: kimalpakaṃ pi sugatāna dhātuṣu ekaṃ pi vādāpiya vādyabhāṇḍam // Saddhp_2.93 //  puṣpeṇa caikena pi pūjayitvā ālekhyabhittau sugatāna bimbān /
tgt_original: 或有人禮拜，　　或復但合掌， 乃至舉一手，　　或復小低頭，

src_original: vikṣiptacittā pi ca pūjayitvā anupūrva drakṣyanti ca buddhakoṭyaḥ // Saddhp_2.94 //
tgt_original: 以此供養像，　　漸見無量佛。

src_original: caturbhiśca garuḍendraiḥ sārdhaṃ bahugaruḍakoṭīśatasahasraparivāraiḥ /  tadyathā - mahātejasā ca garuḍendreṇa,
tgt_original: 韋提希子阿闍世王，與若干百千眷屬俱。

src_original: unnāmitaṃ śīrṣamabhūnmuhūrtamavanāmitaḥ kāyu tathaikavāram // Saddhp_2.95 //
tgt_original: 若人散亂心，　　入於塔廟中，

src_original: namo 'stu buddhāya kṛtaikavāraṃ yehī tadā dhātudhareṣu teṣu /  vikṣiptacittairapi ekavāraṃ te sarvi prāptā imamagrabodhim // Saddhp_2.96 //  ye dharmanāmāpi śruṇiṃsu sattvāste sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.97 //
tgt_original: 一稱南無佛，　　皆已成佛道。 於諸過去佛，　　在世或滅度， 若有聞是法，　　皆已成佛道。

src_original: anāgatā pī bahubuddhakoṭyo acintiyā yeṣu pramāṇu nāsti /
tgt_original: 未來諸世尊，　　其數無有量，

src_original: te pī jinā uttamalokanāthāḥ prakāśayiṣyanti upāyametam // Saddhp_2.98 //
tgt_original: 是諸如來等，　　亦方便說法。

src_original: upāyakauśalyamanantu teṣāṃ bhaviṣyati lokavināyakānām /
tgt_original: 一切諸如來，　　以無量方便，

src_original: yenā vineṣyantiha prāṇakoṭyo bauddhasmi jñānasmi anāsravasmin // Saddhp_2.99 //
tgt_original: 度脫諸眾生，　　入佛無漏智，

src_original: eko 'pi sattvo na kadāci teṣāṃ śrutvāna dharmaṃ na bhaveta buddhaḥ /
tgt_original: 若有聞法者，　　無一不成佛。

src_original: praṇidhānametaddhi tathāgatānāṃ caritva bodhāya carāpayeyam // Saddhp_2.100 //
tgt_original: 諸佛本誓願，　　我所行佛道， 普欲令眾生，　　亦同得此道。

src_original: dharmāmukhā koṭisahasra neke prakāśayiṣyanti anāgate 'dhve /  upadarśayanto imamekayānaṃ vakṣyanti dharmaṃ hi tathāgatatve // Saddhp_2.101 //
tgt_original: 未來世諸佛，　　雖說百千億， 無數諸法門，　　其實為一乘。

src_original: sthitikā hi eṣā sada dharmanetrī prakṛtiśca dharmāṇa sadā prabhā[sate] /  (Vaidya 38)
tgt_original: 諸佛兩足尊，　　知法常無性，

src_original: dharmasthitiṃ dharmaniyāmatāṃ ca nityasthitāṃ loki imāmakampyām /
tgt_original: 是法住法位，　　世間相常住，

src_original: buddhāśca bodhiṃ pṛthivīya maṇḍe prakāśayiṣyanti upāyakauśalam // Saddhp_2.103 //
tgt_original: 於道場知已，　　導師方便說。

src_original: daśasū diśāsū naradevapūjitāstiṣṭhanti buddhā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
tgt_original: 天人所供養，　　現在十方佛， 其數如恒沙，　　出現於世間，

src_original: anena paryāyeṇa ajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ paripūrṇānyaśītiṃ varṣāṇi dānaṃ dadyāt /  atha khalvajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirevaṃ cintayet - ime khalu sattvāḥ sarve mayā krīḍāpitā ramāpitāḥ sukhaṃ jivāpitāḥ /
tgt_original: 是大施主，如是布施滿八十年已，而作是念：

src_original: ime ca te bhavantaḥ sattvā balinaḥ palitaśiraso jīrṇavṛddhā mahallakā (Vaidya 206)  abhyāśībhūtāścaite kālakriyāyāḥ /  yannvahametāṃstathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye 'vatārayeyamanuśāsayeyam /  atha khalvajita sa puruṣastān sarvasattvān samādāpayet /
tgt_original: 『我已施眾生娛樂之具，隨意所欲，然此眾生，皆已衰老年過八十，髮白面皺，將死不久，我當以佛法而訓導之。

src_original: samādāpayitvā ca tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye 'vatārayed grāhayet /  tasya te sattvāstaṃ ca dharmaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /  śrutvā ca ekakṣaṇena ekamuhūrtena ekalavena sarve srotaāpannāḥ syuḥ,  sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'nāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuyuryāvadarhanto bhaveyuḥ,  kṣīṇāsravā dhyāyino mahādhyāyino 'ṣṭavimokṣadhyāyinaḥ /
tgt_original: 』即集此眾生，宣布法化，示教利喜，一時皆得須陀洹道、斯陀含道、阿那含道、阿羅漢道，盡諸有漏，於深禪定皆得自在，具八解脫。

src_original: tatkiṃ manyase ajita api nu sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatistatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavedaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam?
tgt_original: 於汝意云何，是大施主所得功德寧為多不？

src_original: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - evametat bhagavan,
tgt_original: 」彌勒白佛言：

src_original: anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirbahu puṇyaṃ prasavet,  yastāvatāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaṃ dadyāt /
tgt_original: 是人功德甚多，無量無邊。 若是施主，但施眾生一切樂具，功德無量；

src_original: kaḥ punarvādo  yaduttariarhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet //
tgt_original: 何況令得阿羅漢果。

src_original: evamukte bhagavānajitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ārocayāmi te ajita,
tgt_original: 」佛告彌勒：

src_original: prativedayāmi /  yaśca sa dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ puruṣaścaturṣu lokadhātuṣvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ paripūrya arhattve pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyaṃ prasavet,  yaśca pañcāśattamaḥ puruṣaḥ paraṃparāśravānugataḥ śravaṇena ito dharmaparyāyādekāmapi gāthāmekapadamapi śrutvā anumodeta /  yaccaitasya puruṣasyānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu,  yacca tasya puruṣasya dānapatermahādānapaterdānasahagatamarhattvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpanāsahagatapuṇyakriyāvastu,  idameva tato bahutaram /  yo 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ pañcāśattamaḥ,
tgt_original: 「我今分明語汝，是人以一切樂具，施於四百萬億阿僧祇世界六趣眾生，又令得阿羅漢果，所得功德，不如是第五十人，聞法華經一偈隨喜功德，百分、千分、百千萬億分、不及其一，乃至算數譬喻所不能知。

src_original: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniḥadamapi na kḥamate /  evamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamajita so 'pi tāvat pañcāśattamaḥ paraṃparāśravaṇe puruḥa ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi ekapadamapi anumodya ca puṇyaṃ prasavati /  kaḥ punarvādo 'jita yo 'yaṃ mama saṃmukhamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt,
tgt_original: 如是第五十人展轉聞法華經隨喜功德，尚無量無邊阿僧祇，何況最初於會中聞而隨喜者，其福復勝，無量無邊阿僧祇，不可得比。

src_original: śrutvā cābhyanumodet,  aprameyataramasaṃkhyayetaraṃ tasyāhamajita taṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ vadāmi //  yaḥ khalu punarajita asya dharmaparyāyasya śravāṇārthaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svagṛhānniṣkramya vihāraṃ gacchet /  sa ca gattvā tasminnimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ muhūrtakamapi śṛṇuyāt sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā /
tgt_original: 「又，阿逸多！

src_original: sa sattvastanmātreṇa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa kṛtenopacitena jātivinivṛtto dvitīye samucchraye dvitīye ātmabhāvapratilambhe gorathānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati,  aśvarathānāṃ hastirathānāṃ śibikānāṃ goyanānāmṛṣabhayānānāṃ divyānāṃ ca vimānānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati /  sacet punastatra dharmaśravaṇe muhūrtamātramapi niṣadya idaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt, (Vaidya 207)  paraṃ vā niṣādayet,  āsanasaṃvibhāgaṃ vā kuryādaparasya sattvasya,  tena sa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa lābhī bhaviṣyati śakrāsanānāṃ brahmāsanānāṃ cakravartisaṃhāsanānām /
tgt_original: 若人為是經故，往詣僧坊，若坐、若立須臾聽受，緣是功德，轉身所生，得好上妙象、馬車乘、珍寶輦輿，及乘天宮。 若復有人於講法處坐，更有人來，勸令坐聽，若分座令坐，是人功德，轉身得帝釋坐處，若梵王坐處，若轉輪聖王所坐之處。

src_original: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavato bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośādekā raśmirniścaritā /  tāni ca sarvāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi tasyā raśmeḥ prabhayā suparisphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma yāvadavīcirmahānirayo yāvacca bhavāgram /
tgt_original: 爾時佛放眉間白毫相光，照東方萬八千世界，靡不周遍，下至阿鼻地獄，上至阿迦尼吒天。

src_original: sacet punarajita kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aparaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadet - āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
tgt_original: 「阿逸多！ 若復有人，語餘人言：

src_original: saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuṣva /
tgt_original: 『有經，名法華，可共往聽。

src_original: sa ca puruṣastasya tāṃ protsāhanāmāgamya yadi muhūrtamātramapi śṛṇuyāt,  sa sattvastena protsāhena kuśalamūlenābhisaṃskṛtena dhāraṇīpratilabdhairbodhisattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ samavadhānaṃ pratilabhate /  ajaḍaśca bhavati,  tīkṣṇendriyaḥ prajñāvān /  na tasya jātiśatasahasrairapi pūti mukhaṃ bhavati na durgandhi /
tgt_original: 』即受其教，乃至須臾間聞，是人功德，轉身得與陀羅尼菩薩共生一處，利根智慧，百千萬世終不瘖瘂，口氣不臭，舌常無病，口亦無病，齒不垢黑、不黃、不踈，亦不缺落，不差、不曲，脣不下垂亦不褰縮、不麁澁、不瘡胗，亦不缺壞，亦不喎斜，不厚、不大，亦不黧黑，無諸可惡。

src_original: nāpyasya jihvārogo bhavati,  na mukharogo bhavati /  na ca śyāmadanto bhavati,  na viṣamadanto bhavati,
tgt_original: 鼻不匾㔸，亦不曲戾，面色不黑，亦不狹長，亦不窊曲，無有一切不可喜相。

src_original: na pītadanto bhavati,  nābhyantaroṣṭho na prasāritoṣṭho na khaṇḍoṣṭho na vaṅkoṣṭho na kṛṣṇoṣṭho na bībhatsoṣṭho bhavati /  na cipīṭanāso bhavati,  na dīrghamukho bhavati,
tgt_original: 脣舌牙齒悉皆嚴好，鼻修高直，面貌圓滿，眉高而長，額廣平正，人相具足，世世所生，見佛聞法、信受教誨。 「阿逸多！

src_original: pañcāśimo yaśca paraṃparāyāṃ sūtrasyimasyo śṛṇutekagāthām /  anumodayitvā ca prasannacittaḥ śṛṇuṣva puṇyaṃ bhavi yattakaṃ tat // Saddhp_17.2 //
tgt_original: 最後人獲福，　　今當分別之。

src_original: sa caiva puruṣo bhavi dānadātā sattvān koṭīnayuteṣu nityam /
tgt_original: 如有大施主，　　供給無量眾，
